name: Shover Maker
description:
Shover, the game about shoving people into the lava to set them ablaze, now you can make your own Shover-Like Minigame!

Controls:

UP arrow to start or stop game-play  In-Game: Player: WASD to move, SPACE to shove. Editor: Space to hide "selected" Icon Space while touching " selected icon" to make it transparent so you can see behind it. L to change lava mode Down arrow while touching an object to erase it WASD to move, space to shove!
